item.title: Canned Craft Beer
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: A slowly-growing trend in craft beer is to package it in cans. 21st Amendment, which we visited in 2008, is one of the few that does this now and we can finally get their beers locally so Gay picked some up recently. I look forward to getting more craft beer in a can -- easier to carry, less prone to breakage, better protection from light and air and more eco-friendly. This Brew Free! or Die IPA is delicious. We also got their Hell or High Watermelon Wheat, which I'd heard good things about in spite of it being a wheat beer, but I didn't like it at all.
